channel.title: Project TitanX 742|New upcoming server join now!|6 Core VPS|24/7|Tons of Content
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6YUrb5u.gif[/img]
[B]Navigation[/B] [URL=http://"http://project-titanx.ddns.net"]Home[/URL] [URL=http://"http://project-titanx.ddns.net/forums"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://project-titanx.ddns.net/mmo/what-is-titanx.html"]Server Description[/URL] [URL=http://"http://project-titanx.ddns.net/clients"]Download[/URL]
[B]Welcome[/B] Get ready to see the best content-wise server online. Project TitanX offers all 24 RS718 skills, well combat, active pvm, unique minigames, 100% stability combined with staff professionalism, unique interfaces, and a beautiful game-play. We promise you to have nice game-play and to enjoy the friendly community. Donating for ranks IS NOT required. We do weekly giveaways for items, exp boosts, drops and donator ranks.
[B]Stability[/B] Project TitanX contains little to no bugs, since release there has not been one dupe found, keep in mind Project TitanX is written well by Beast(HostRaptor). There has not been any rollbacks. The game has never crashed due to a coding mistake. Cheat engines are absolutely useless on the server.. The server is very optimized, don't expect any lag at all whilst playing.
[U][B]Features[/B][/U]
- Shooting Stars - Double XP Well - Charm Seekers' - Double XP Weekends - Lava Mining - Mineral Deposit Mining - RuneSpan - Advanced Agility Courses - Full Resource Dungeons - Point Shops - Custom Bosses - Slayer Bosses - Bonecrusher - Perfect Gem Cutting - 100% Glacors - Iron Man Mode
[U]Minigames[/U] - Duel Arena - Barrows - Pest Control - Tzhaar Fight Caves - Fight Kiln - Recipe For disaster - Troll Invasion - Clan wars - Zombies! Mini-Game - Soul Wars - Dominion Tower - Castle Wars
[U]Bosses+[/U] - Full Godwars! - Glacors - Lucien - Sunfreet - Blink - Nomad - Yk' Lagor Thunderous - KBD - QBD - Avatar of Destruction - Corporeal Beast - Dagganoth Kings - Party Demon(Oblivion) - Hope devourer and more!
[U]Skills[/U] - All 25 Skills Working - Includes Construction & Dungeoneering
[U]Misc[/U] - Very Well Written Combat System - No Lag - Safe Server - No Dupes - Flawless Content - Clue Scrolls - Weapon Poisoning - Arrows Poisoning - Music System - All Areas have Music - Whole Runescape Map Could be Used - Charm Seekers' Necklace - Custom Nex Sets and much more!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OK2fVnp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HHT17qg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ObLXTqZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ChGRyB0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6Vtl56E.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rmh3PjO.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eiYDTFC.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aCT01ID.jpg[/img]
[B]Credits[/B] [U]HostRaptor(Beast) Matrix [/U]
[/CENTER]

[B]Welcome[/B]
Get ready to see the best content-wise server online.
Project TitanX offers all 24 RS718 skills, well combat, active pvm, unique minigames, 100% stability combined with staff professionalism, unique interfaces, and a beautiful game-play.
We promise you to have nice game-play and to enjoy the friendly community. Donating for ranks IS NOT required. We do weekly giveaways for items, exp boosts, drops and donator ranks.

[B]Stability[/B]
Project TitanX contains little to no bugs, since release there has not been one dupe found, keep in mind Project TitanX is written well by Beast(HostRaptor). There has not been any rollbacks. The game has never crashed due to a coding mistake. Cheat engines are absolutely useless on the server… The server is very optimized, don’t expect any lag at all whilst playing.
